summary: The 'Protect Beneficiaries from Middlemen Act' amends Title XVIII of the Social Security Act to limit cost-sharing for prescription drugs under Medicare Part D. It caps cost-sharing for a month's supply of a covered drug at the average net price, starting January 1, 2027. The bill also includes conforming amendments for low-income individuals and mandates a GAO report by January 1, 2029, analyzing compliance, enforcement, and public awareness of the changes, with improvement recommendations.
